data.meta_description:
I cannot emphasise how much I prefer Founders that let their product/tech/results do the talking rather than themselves. 

Michel Fathallah Incredible scenes.
data.text:
We visited Ancient Olympia this week. The Olympics were very important to the Greek Culture. Why? Many reasonsâ€¦ It got everyone in the Greek Nation togetherâ€¦it was suppose to be fair competition (no trickery) and it allowed people to cheer for good sportsman. They called a Olympic Truce for people to participate or attend the games even when wars were happening. These games traditionally occurred every 4 years for many centuries. What traditions are important to you? Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Tradition is the illusion of permanence. Tradition becomes our security, and when the mind is secure it is in decay. It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition. #tradition #comforting #history #security #peaceofmind #soulfulresting #olympics #games #competition #fairplay #cheering #goodvsbad KanKeta Global Sytems

Do you know what the five #Olympic rings represent? And why they are the colors they are? Itâ€™s always wonderful to tell a story that teaches and connects to you, or your companyâ€™s passion or purpose. As always, Pantone, does a great job of storytelling through color. You wonâ€™t see the rings now throughout these games without thinking of them and their swatches. What story can you make more colorful? #branding #marketing #CMO #Storytelling

Sometimes, focusing on the fundamentals and mastering the basics can be more effective. 2. ğ‘¨ğ’…ğ’‚ğ’‘ğ’•ğ’‚ğ’ƒğ’Šğ’ğ’Šğ’•ğ’š ğ’‚ğ’ğ’… ğ‘¹ğ’†ğ’”ğ’ğ’–ğ’“ğ’„ğ’†ğ’‡ğ’–ğ’ğ’ğ’†ğ’”ğ’”: the ability to adapt and make the best use of available resources is crucial. Even without all the optimal tools, success is possible through creativity and resourcefulness. 3. ğ‘ªğ’ğ’ğ’‡ğ’Šğ’…ğ’†ğ’ğ’„ğ’† ğ’‚ğ’ğ’… ğ‘ºğ’†ğ’ğ’‡-ğ‘©ğ’†ğ’ğ’Šğ’†ğ’‡: believing in oneâ€™s abilities and skills can outweigh the need for external aids. Confidence can lead to high performance, even in the face of seemingly better-equipped competition. 4. ğ‘ªğ’‰ğ’‚ğ’ğ’ğ’†ğ’ğ’ˆğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ‘µğ’ğ’“ğ’ğ’”: just because everyone follows a certain standard or uses specific tools doesnâ€™t mean itâ€™s the only path to success. Challenging the norms and thinking outside the box can lead to unique achievements. 5. ğ‘­ğ’ğ’„ğ’–ğ’”ğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ ğ’ğ’ ğ‘ªğ’ğ’“ğ’† ğ‘ºğ’•ğ’“ğ’†ğ’ğ’ˆğ’•ğ’‰ğ’”: emphasizing oneâ€™s core strengths and capabilities, rather than relying solely on external tools or enhancements, can be a key differentiator. These lessons emphasize that in business, as in sports, having the right mindset, focusing on core competencies, and being resourcefulness can lead to remarkable success, even in a competitive environment. Do you agree?
